forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers during the evening giving way to periods of light rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
